raw_text:
HEAD CHEF       Summary     I am currently a student focused on earning a B.A. in Computer Science  and becoming an Android app developer. My goal is to develop technical skills to develop and manage investment activities in the international markets.       Areas of Expertise         I have experience with Android Studio, Java, XML, Android SDK, Google APIs, databases, Jsoup, Firebase, and Material Design. I am currently developing my own app for Google Playstore and Amazon app market.     I have experience using HTML, CSS, Javascript, and Bootstrap, Photoshop, and Paint.net.           Experience     02/2013   to   02/2014     Company Name   －   City  ,   State      Responsible for customer service at the sushi bar, preparing quality authentic entrées and appetizers,
manage and utilize luxury imported products conservatively to minimize shrinkage and maintain
overhead.  Responsible for training new employees and maintaining safety and efficiency behind sushi
bar.         02/2008   to   03/2015     Head Chef    Company Name   －   City  ,   State      Prepare entrées in timely fashion, maintain efficiency and safety in work environment.  Support and
train new employees in kitchen.  Maintain cleanliness in the kitchen and sushi bar.         01/2005   to   01/2006     Ramp Agent    Company Name          Responsible for guiding aircraft traffic, baggage handling, maintaining security on ramp, removal of
hazardous debris, customer support, cabin maintenance, operating Ground Support Equipment such as
tugs, forklifts, and belt loaders.  Responsible for delivery of high priority air-freight to cargo in timely
fashion.          Education          Associate of Science  :   Finance    Midlands Technical College   －     State  ,   Columbia    Finance            Associate of Science  :   Mathematical Economics    Miami Dade College   －   City  ,   State             2017     Associate of Science  :   Computer Science    University of North Georgia   －   City  ,   State              Skills     Accounting, customer service, airfreight delivery, retail, operating airport vehicles to tug aircraft and luggage, maintaining safety in highly secure areas of airport terminal, inventory, managing, preparing quality entrees and beverages.       Activities and Honors     I am involved in an import-export business my family and I have prepared trading agricultural goods from Iran to the United States.
story:
Let me transform this resume into a story:

This is the tale of a versatile professional who's undergone quite the career evolution. Starting in the aviation industry back in 2005, they worked as a Ramp Agent, where they could be found guiding aircraft on the tarmac, handling baggage, and zipping around in tugs and forklifts. They were the person making sure your priority air-freight made it to its destination on time, all while keeping the airport ramp free of dangerous debris.

But their story takes an interesting turn towards the culinary arts. From 2008 to 2015, they flourished as a Head Chef, mastering the art of sushi preparation and kitchen management. They weren't just creating delicious entrées; they were mentoring new staff and running a tight ship in terms of kitchen safety and cleanliness. They even had a special knack for managing luxury imported ingredients, making sure nothing went to waste.

Now, here's where it gets really interesting - they're reinventing themselves once again. Currently pursuing a B.A. in Computer Science, they've developed impressive technical chops in Android development, working with tools like Android Studio, Java, and Firebase. They're even building their own app for the Google Play Store and Amazon app market!

Their educational journey is equally diverse, with Associate degrees in Finance from Midlands Technical College, Mathematical Economics from Miami Dade College, and Computer Science from the University of North Georgia. As if that weren't enough, they're also involved in their family's import-export business, trading agricultural goods between Iran and the United States.

It's quite the story of someone who's worn many hats - from airport operations to culinary arts to tech development - all while pursuing education in finance and economics. Talk about a renaissance professional!
